ygData.subject: RE: Re: Monk Loot and Modifications
ygData.msgSnippet: good gawd let it go... We asked, they said no. I for one am more tired of hearin everyone moan about it than I am of wishin we had them. Convincing us isn t
ygData.messageBody:
good gawd let it go... We asked, they said no. I for one am more tired of
hearin everyone moan about it than I am of wishin we had them. Convincing us
isn't gonna do a dang bit of good. If you feel that strongly about it, write
them and ask them for their reasonings. But just dont sit there and bemoan
the same thing over and over.

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Court Little [SMTP:courtlend@...]
> Sent: Monday, August 30, 1999 2:07 PM
> To: EQ-Monks@onelist.com
> Subject: Re: [EQ-Monks] Re: Monk Loot and Modifications
>
> From: "Court Little" <courtlend@...>
>
> Hmm Am I getting through? It's possible to animate 19 different helmets
> for
> Barbarians but a simple colored stripe on the monk will blow the engine
> and
> all voodoo 1's?
>
